animeDescription: Mini anime to promote the movie Saezuru Tori wa Habatakanai: The Clouds Gather, in which the characters turned into cats and dogs.   The BD/DVD includes the 25 episodes released on the official Twitter account, in addition to 5 new episodes.
animeRelated: ['Saezuru Tori wa Habatakanai: The Clouds Gather']
